trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around June 6th 1997
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile having a nml conversation with theson of a neighbor and actually telling him of seeing the following descriptionwhile on the base just recently. before the nite in ? It was a very bright orbof light that did not emit any glare so as to be unable to gaze at it. When itmoved across the treetops it left a noticeable trail then disappeared. Ittravel for about a 100 yards as if wanting me to notice it.Previous to thisevent and again late nite I noticed the same type of orb while taking in thenite air. It moved at treetop lvl but when noticed by me immediatelydisappeared as if a swith turned it off, and still a noticable trail was left.
